Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_sample_playback_rate

The function AIL_3D_sample_playback_rate returns the current playback rate for the specified sample handle.

S32 AIL_3D_sample_playback_rate(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Returns

The current playback rate in samples per second (frequency).


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_3D_sample_playback_rate
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, S32
